    A

    abilities - package abilities
     
    AbilityRenderer - Class in ui.renderer
    Renders visual effects for special abilities on the battlefield.
    AbilityRenderer(SpecialAbility) - Constructor for class ui.renderer.AbilityRenderer
    Initializes the renderer with the specific ability to render.
    activate(Attackable) - Method in class abilities.NukeAbility
    If NukeAbility is ready and target is , deals damage to target and trigger the cooldown.
    activate(Attackable) - Method in class abilities.SpecialAbility
    This method activate ability onto the target.
    activate(List<? extends Attackable>) - Method in class abilities.NukeAbility
    If NukeAbility is ready, targets is not null and targets is not empty, deals damage to each alive target and trigger cooldown after finished.
    addAbilityRenderer(AbilityRenderer) - Method in class ui.BattlefieldView
    Triggers the rendering of an ability effect.
    addToPane(Pane) - Method in class ui.renderer.ProjectileRenderer
    Adds the projectile shape to the specified pane.
    addToPane(Pane) - Method in class ui.renderer.TurretRenderer
    Adds the turret image to the specified pane.
    addToPane(Pane) - Method in class ui.renderer.UnitRenderer
    Adds the unit's image and health bar to the specified pane.
    addTurret(Turret) - Method in class base.Base
    Adds new turret into TURRETS if TURRETS size is less than turretCapacity.
    addTurretRenderer(TurretRenderer) - Method in class ui.BattlefieldView
    Adds a TurretRenderer to the battlefield view.
    addUnitRenderer(UnitRenderer) - Method in class ui.BattlefieldView
    Adds a UnitRenderer to the battlefield view.
    amount() - Method in record class This_Package_Is_Cursed_Do_Not_Ever_Try_To_Change_Name_Or_It_Will_Explode.GameManager.DamageEvent
    Returns the value of the amount record component.
    AntiArmoredUnit - Class in units

    Initializes the field according to given parameters.
    applyVariance(int) - Method in class turrets.Turret
    Applies a random variance to the base damage.
    ArmoredUnit - Class in units
    A unit which can attack from close range and can reduce damage taken.
    ArmoredUnit(int, int, int, int, int, double) - Constructor for class units.ArmoredUnit
    Initializes the field according to given parameters.
    attack(Attackable) - Method in class units.Unit
    Returns the amount of damage the target is taken.
    Attackable - Interface in interfaces
    Interface representing any entity that can take damage and has a life state.

    B

    base - package base
     
    Base - Class in base
    The base of the player for deploying Unit and setup Turret; if hp is 0 or less than 0, the game ends.
    Base(int) - Constructor for class base.Base
    Initializes the field according to the given parameter, sets turretCapacity to 1, and initializes Arraylist<> for TURRETS.
    BattlefieldView - Class in ui
    The primary view for the game battlefield.
    BattlefieldView(SceneManager, GameController, SoundManager) - Constructor for class ui.BattlefieldView
    Initializes the battlefield view.
